options.text: Darwinian natural evolution

options.label: B
options.text: Darwinian natural selection

options.label: C
options.text: Evolutionary adaptation

options.label: D
options.text: Survival of the fittest

options.label: A

options.label: B
options.text: Brain structure, skin, and eyes

options.label: C
options.text: Limbs, organs, and body shape

options.label: D
options.text: Cells, tissues, and organs

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: C
